roleset.name: steal, embezzle

example.text: ... over NT$ 2.59 billion *U* in misappropriated public funds.

roleset.note: Frameset created by Jena based on wsj; nominal 'misappropriation' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls steal-10.5.

example.name: nominal rel: misappropriation
example.text: There is also an extremely strange legal provision , in criminal law there is no stipulation to engage the death penalty for misappropriation of public funds !
